name: Danielle Star Noah
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Greetings!

I’m very interested in a position as a budtender in the Los Angeles area. I believe I’m right for this job and would be an ideal candidate because I have several years of experience working in the cannabis industry and I am a very dedicated worker. I have been trimming and growing over the last ten years and have managed three different dispensaries in Los Angeles and Eugene, Oregon. I am also friendly, punctual, articulate, and a great team player. 

I recently moved back to the Los Angeles area and I’m eager to start working with a company in which I can grow and progress. I am seeking a position with potential for forward momentum and I believe this is it!

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to discussing this opportunity with you further. 

Regards, 
Danielle Star Noah 
310-430-6839
experience:
Head Budtender 
July 2016 - January 2017
Oregon’s Green Rush - Eugene, OR
Provide excellent customer service to all recreational and medical clients, update electronic menu, create and maintain Wikileaf page, learn about all different strains carried in the dispensary, scheduling, marketing, advertising, opening and closing responsibilities, implement promotional discounts and specials, etc.

Budtender and Manager
July 2011 - July 2012
MedMan40/MedStar
Assisted patients in determining the best strain for their medical needs, weighed and packaged products, ordered edibles, decided on new strains to carry in the dispensary, opening and closing duties, counting down tills and dropping off deposits, paying out employees at the end of the day, etc.
